response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique and valuable product to you. This item holds significant worth to us at $1,200,000, reflecting its exceptional quality and rarity. Given its immense value to you at $800,000, we aim to bridge this gap with an offer that respects both parties' interests. We kindly invite you to consider acquiring our product for $950,000. This proposal aims to be fair, ensuring that you receive substantial value while allowing us to achieve a satisfactory return on our investment. We believe this price reflects the product's true worth and aligns closely with its value to you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
